refnamediv.refpurpose: Configuring and using the Script API

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: The Script API is a flexible system for invoking user-supplied scripts at various points in the execution of Amanda. This manual page describes the operation and configuration of the API. For help writing Script API scripts, see http://wiki.zmanda.com/index.php/Script_API.

refsect1.title: INCLUDED SCRIPTS
refsect1.para: This section lists the scripts included with &A;, see their man page for instructions on using them. For complete How-To information, consult the Amanda wiki at http://wiki.zmanda.com.

refsect2.title: script-email
refsect2.para: script-email is a simple script that sends one or more emails every time it is invoked.
